what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal bbsTaiwan streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) data retrieval analysis. support data retrieval GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. ‘bbsTrim’ also include population trend modelling, using TRIM (TRends Indices Monitoring data). Users can tailor species analysis, controlling data stratification, preparation, modeling. goal expand Taiwan BBS data access broader R-society Taiwan.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(bbsTaiwan) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
